title:
I want to put a camper on my daughters property for 3-4 months to live in temporarily. What are the laws? Do I

We need a permit? Her address is 8505 Sidbury road new Hanover county nc   Thanks, Lissa
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/02/i-want-to-put-a-camper-on-my-daughters-new-hanover-county-property-to-live-in-temporarily-what-are-the-laws-do-we-need-a-permit/
